guest_services.name: 24/7 Concierge Service
guest_services.description: Our dedicated concierge team is available around the clock to assist with reservations, local recommendations, transportation arrangements, and any special requests to enhance your stay.

guest_services.name: Laundry & Dry Cleaning
guest_services.description: Professional laundry and dry cleaning services with same-day or next-day delivery. We handle everything from casual wear to delicate fabrics with care.

guest_services.name: In-Room Dining
guest_services.description: Enjoy our restaurant's exquisite menu from the comfort of your room. Full breakfast, lunch, and dinner service available with dishes prepared fresh by our kitchen team.

guest_services.name: Spa & Wellness Services
guest_services.description: Relax and rejuvenate with our traditional Moroccan spa treatments, including argan oil massages, hammam sessions, and wellness therapies using local herbs and ingredients.

guest_services.name: Airport Transfer Service
guest_services.description: Comfortable and reliable transfer service to and from Essaouira Airport. Professional drivers familiar with the area ensure a smooth journey to start or end your stay.

local_places.name: Essaouira Medina
local_places.description: UNESCO World Heritage site featuring the historic medina with its distinctive blue and white architecture, bustling souks, art galleries, and traditional crafts workshops.

local_places.name: Essaouira Beach
local_places.description: Expansive sandy beach perfect for windsurfing, kitesurfing, and beach walks. Known for consistent trade winds and beautiful sunset views over the Atlantic Ocean.

local_places.name: La Table by Madada
local_places.description: Upscale restaurant serving modern Moroccan cuisine with French influences. Beautiful rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the medina and ocean.

local_places.name: Galerie Damgaard
local_places.description: Renowned art gallery showcasing works by local Essaouira artists, including paintings, sculptures, and traditional crafts. A cultural hub for contemporary Moroccan art.

local_places.name: Taros Café
local_places.description: Popular café and restaurant with live music, serving international and Moroccan dishes. Great atmosphere for evening drinks with regular live performances.

local_places.name: Skala de la Ville
local_places.description: Historic fortress ramparts with bronze cannons and stunning ocean views. Perfect for sunset photography and understanding Essaouira's maritime defensive history.

transportation.name: Grand Taxi Service
transportation.description: Shared taxi service connecting Essaouira to major cities like Marrakech and Casablanca. Economical option for longer distances with local atmosphere.

transportation.name: Private Taxi
transportation.description: Comfortable private taxi service for airport transfers, city tours, and day trips. Professional drivers with knowledge of local attractions and routes.

transportation.name: Car Rental - Hertz
transportation.description: International car rental service with a variety of vehicles from compact cars to SUVs. Perfect for exploring the region at your own pace.

transportation.name: Supratours Bus
transportation.description: Comfortable bus service connecting Essaouira to Marrakech, Agadir, and other major destinations. Reliable and affordable option for intercity travel.

transportation.name: Bicycle Rental
transportation.description: Explore Essaouira and surrounding areas on two wheels. Various bike types available including city bikes and mountain bikes for coastal trails.

transportation.name: Horse-drawn Carriage
transportation.description: Traditional and romantic way to explore Essaouira's main sights. Perfect for couples or those wanting a unique local experience through the medina.
